Warm-up (on Formative)

Warm-up

struct alpha {
    char x[10];
    int y;
};
struct beta {
    int b;
    int c;
};
int main() {
    struct alpha a = { "Colgate", 13 };
    struct beta b = { 1, 2 };
    struct beta c = { 3, 4 };
    a.y += -13;
    b.b = 5;
    c = b;
    b.c = 6;
    printf("a %s %d\n", a.x, a.y);
    printf("b %d %d\n", b.b, b.c);
    printf("c %d %d\n", c.b, c.c);
}
